plot outline: Jaggu is faced with a crisis when he isn't able to fulfill his wife's dreams of a better lifestyle or his mother's wish for a grandchild. Jaggu's wife will bear his child only when they become rich and his job as a recovery agent doesn't seem to help. Jaggu gets a job offer from a bank where he must capture a criminal who absconded with lakhs of money. He sets up a team of misfits to travel to the UK where he must capture the clever criminal and collect his reward.
title: Ye Re Ye Re Paisa 2
plot: Jaggu is faced with a crisis when he isn't able to fulfill his wife's dreams of a better lifestyle or his mother's wish for a grandchild. Jaggu's wife will bear his child only when they become rich and his job as a recovery agent doesn't seem to help. Jaggu gets a job offer from a bank where he must capture a criminal who absconded with lakhs of money. He sets up a team of misfits to travel to the UK where he must capture the clever criminal and collect his reward.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

After his return from Africa Jaggu is asked by Jhanvi to work for her.Jaggu makes his team of people Harsh,Sara and Jango who own him money and promises to wave off their loan and give them money on top of it.Jaggu's task is to bring defaulter Neeraj Shah back to India from London.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Jaggu returns from Africa and finds that his mother has passed away leaving behind a condition that her ashes will be immersed only when he bears a child his wife Ranjana tells him that if he wants a child he should be capable of providing all luxuries to their child.Jhanvi Mazumdar was the one who freed Jaggu from Africa as she wants to send him to London on a mission to get back Neeraj Shah who has duped several banks in India.Jaggu agrees to be part of the mission but if he fails he has to pay all the expense to Jhanvi which will be taken care during the mission, he makes his own team of people like Sarah,Harsh and Jango who are his defaulters and promises them to wave of their loan if the mission is success and give them two Crore each but if they fail they will have to reimburse him the mission expenses.Jaggu along with Tenya ,Sarah,Harsh and Jango reach London where they are helped by a Maharashtiran man calling himself Country.As they are close towards reaching Neeraj Shah his car meets with an accident and he passes away leaving them no option rather then to abandon the mission.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
